lines: Since you are getting on in years, your friends suggest that a physical exercise program might be beneficial to you. A health club might not be a bad idea.
The price of a membership is $1000. Would you care to join?
Your Physical Sphere shows that you are in decent shape. There probably won't be any serious short-term consequences, but that doesn't mean you can neglect yourself, either.

Chances are, you are less active during this phase of the game, than when you were younger. You have been fortunate enough to avoid anything serious thus far. Your Physical sphere shows that your health is declining. Be careful.
I'm sorry. You don't have enough resources to join a health club. You will just have to do sit-ups in your living room for now.
After a week of sweating and toiling, you feel worse than when you began. Do you honestly think you can keep up with this?

You haven't taken this very seriously, have you? If you don't keep in shape, you are likely to suffer a heart attack or a stroke. You probably won't see the effects of an exercise program like this for a month or two, especially at your

It's not very likely that you will, considering the fact that you are the impulsive type, and impulsive people generally don't stick to things very long. One of the ways you can discipline yourself is by joining an aerobics class. Would
you care to sign up for Wendy's Early Evening Tummy Toner Class?

The class is full of women at least fifteen years your junior. Wendy is fond of wearing exercise togs that are cut low in the front and high on the sides. Getting in shape might be more fun than you think... AND a ONE... BOUNCE! AND a
TWO... BOUNCE! At the end of a six week program, your body looks terrific, but you will need a strong eyeglass prescription from the optical strain.

Too bad. You should have seen Wendy. She has an extremely well-toned tummy, not to mention other slim and trim features. Watching her bounce up and down during her class strengthens the body and puts the mind at peace.

Since you have decided not to take the class, you begin your own work-out program in earnest, but because of your poor impulse control, you stop attending before any long-term benefits can be achieved.
You certainly have the self-discipline needed for sticking to a rigorous exercise program. How about joining a nice aerobics class to get your heart in shape?

I guess you are the type that wants to get the job done alone. You are missing out on Wendy's Early Evening Tummy Toner program at the club. Wendy is one of those exercise instructors who is fond of wearing outfits with the low-cut necks
and high-cut legs. Are you sure you don't want to sign up?
O.K., suit yourself. You are good enough to stick to it without the incentive. Because of your perseverence, your Physical Sphere takes a remarkable jump. You are now in excellent physical shape.

I'm sorry. When all your friends found out about Wendy, and her talent for bouncing through aerobics class in skimpy outfits, the class filled up practically overnight. Your perseverence and desire to get in shape pays off in other ways.
Your Physical Sphere shows that you are in decent shape. There probably won't be any serious short term consequences, but that doesn't mean you can neglect yourself, either.

Chances are, you are less active during this phase of life than when you were younger. You have been fortunate enough to avoid anything serious thus far. Now, however, you have pushed your luck. As a result of neglecting yourself, you
suffer a fatal stroke and die at an early age. This game is over.
